mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.article_id, a.article_name AS title, a.excerpt, a.create_time AS date, u.username AS author, CASE WHEN p.article_categories IS NULL THEN c.article_categories ELSE CONCAT(p.article_categories, '/', c.article_categories) END AS category, a.page_views, a.alias FROM article a INNER JOIN user_information u ON a.uuid = u.uuid LEFT JOIN article_categories c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN article_categories p ON c.parent_id = p.id WHERE a.status = 1 ORDER BY a.page_views DESC LIMIT 10;
